name: @wendelmax/tasklets
description: Modern high-performance tasklets for Node.js with Promise-based API, automatic error handling, and intuitive configuration

scripts.build:prebuilds: npm run build:prebuilds:windows && npm run build:prebuilds:linux:container
scripts.build:prebuilds:linux:container: podman run --rm -v "%cd%:/app" -w /app node:20-bullseye bash -c "apt-get update && apt-get install -y python3 make g++ build-essential cmake libuv1-dev && npm install && npm run build:prebuilds:linux"
scripts.build:prebuilds:windows:container: podman build -t tasklets-cross-win -f Dockerfile.cross . && podman run --rm -v "%cd%:/app" -w /app tasklets-cross-win bash -c "update-alternatives --set x86_64-w64-mingw32-g++ /usr/bin/x86_64-w64-mingw32-g++-posix && update-alternatives --set x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc /usr/bin/x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc-posix && npm install --ignore-scripts && curl -fLo /root/node.lib https://nodejs.org/dist/v20.20.0/win-x64/node.lib && export NODE_LIB_PATH=/root/node.lib && echo 'set(CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME Windows)' > toolchain-mingw.cmake && echo 'set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc)' >> toolchain-mingw.cmake && echo 'set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER x86_64-w64-mingw32-g++)' >> toolchain-mingw.cmake && echo 'set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILER x86_64-w64-mingw32-windres)' >> toolchain-mingw.cmake && echo 'set(CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH /usr/x86_64-w64-mingw32)' >> toolchain-mingw.cmake && ./node_modules/.bin/cmake-js compile --verbose --CDCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=toolchain-mingw.cmake"
scripts.test:cctest: echo 'C++ tests not yet migrated to cmake-js'
scripts.bench: npm run bench:image && npm run bench:data && npm run bench:crypto
scripts.bench:legacy: npm run bench:run && npm run bench:runAll && npm run bench:batch && npm run bench:overhead
